name: Newton Dark UI
tagline: Another dark UI theme for Atom
body:
### Newton Dark UI Theme

This theme is based on the Atom Dark UI theme, but has vertical file tabs and can be activated by going to
the _Themes_ section in the Settings view (`cmd-,`) and selecting it from the
_UI Themes_ drop-down menu.

Use the  Newton Dark Syntax _syntax theme_ for more newtonian goodness.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
